import React from "react"; import "./Basket.css"; import BasketOrderItem from "../Components/BasketOrderItem"; import axios from "axios"; import { baseUrl } from "../baseUrl/baseUrl"; import Loading from "../Components/Loading/Loading"; const Basket = () => { const [active, setActive] = React.useState(""); const [typeUser, setTypeUser] = React.useState("individual"); const [orders, setOrders] = React.useState([]); const [entityOrders, setEntityOrders] = React.useState({ userId: "", products: [], stir: "", entityName: "", phone: "", city: "", street: "", }); const [userOrder, setUserOrder] = React.useState({ userId: "", products: [], phone: "", city: "", street: "", }); const deleteHandler = React.useCallback( (e, data) => { let basket = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("salamBasket")); if (basket) { const filter = basket.filter((item) => item.id !== data._id); localStorage.setItem("salamBasket", JSON.stringify(filter)); } }, [orders] ); const onChangeEntity = (e) => { setEntityOrders({ ...entityOrders, [e.target.name]: e.target.values }); }; const radioHandler = (e) => { setActive(e.target.value); }; React.useEffect(() => { const basket = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("salamBasket")); if (basket) { const ids = basket.map((item) => item.id); axios .post( baseUrl + "/products/cart", { products: ids }, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, } ) .then((res) => { setOrders(res.data); }); } }, [deleteHandler]); const submitHandler = (e) => { console.log(entityOrders); }; return (
